results.content: The course is concise and moves along at a lively pace, after just one hour a developer is up to speed with the features of GTM
results.content_html: The course is concise and moves along at a lively pace, after just one hour a developer is up to speed with the features of GTM

results.content: Very helpful! My only small critique is that there are moments where the instructor glosses over where he got the javascript code to call APIs such as Facebook. However, he does briefly mentioned it later in the course, which helped me connect the dots. I loved the fast pace and seeing the the interface in use. I would have liked more details about the types of variables and triggers. On the other hand, this was such a great and fast way to get started.

results.content: I really enjoyed the course and found the content relevant to what I was looking for. I really like the section layout and found the structure perfect for understanding of the core tag manager purpose.
